content.text:
# Draft:List of Hull Kingston Rovers seasons

Hull Kingston Rovers are an English professional rugby league club based in Kingston upon Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire. The club has competed in the sport since joining the Northern Football Union in 1897. This list details the club's achievements in all major competitions.
